title: FS T206 PSA 4 Eddie Collins SC350,25 Back SOLDDD
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: FS T206 PSA 4 Eddie Collins SC350,25 Back SOLDDD
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
This one was way tougher than I expected.  SC 350 Factory 25 is one under rated back especially with the 350 only players, in my opinion.

PSA 4 Eddie Collins SC 350, 25
$200 delivered with price reduction

Paypal is preferred.  Emails come first as I travel all the time and don't get a chance to check the board as often as I like.

Thanks for the time,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

[URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/Eddie%20Collins%20cards/?action=view&current=T206SC35025CollinsFront.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/Eddie%20Collins%20cards/T206SC35025CollinsFront.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/Eddie%20Collins%20cards/?action=view&current=T206SC35025CollinsBack.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/Eddie%20Collins%20cards/T206SC35025CollinsBack.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Hey folks,
I wanted to give this one a nudge for the price drop.
Thanks as always,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

SOrry for the delay guys.  I just woke up.  Looks like Marty is taking this one.
Thanks again,
Bob
